ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark for Lower Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: *Grin* Kunark would be even more inconvenient than Lavastorm. However, there is Kurn s Tower. There are lower level things in Lake of Ill Omen. There is the
ygData.messageBody:
*Grin*
Kunark would be even more inconvenient than Lavastorm.

However, there is Kurn's Tower. There are lower level things in Lake of Ill
Omen. There is the bone pit in Field of Bones, and a whole range of
things in the Swamp of No Hope. Basically, you want to go to where the
Iskar are growing up.


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kevin Blomseth [mailto:gerbilb@...]
>Sent: Monday, May 22, 2000 9:23 PM

>I was just wondering if there was anyplace in Kunark where those
>around Level 13 could hunt. Oasis is always crowded, and a lot of
>other places are inconvienent (Lavastorm).
>
>Waladen
>Bard of 13 Songs
>Luclin
